Imagery Description: I. Hermes, wearing petasos, and holding phiale and caduceus, bending forward in front of seated woman wearing a black chiton, and holding a wreath and fillet in her l. hand. Ext.: berried laurel.
Additional Notes: The seated woman has two small horns on her brow, and may therefore be intended to represent Io, though they are more like those of a goat than a cow.
